name: BlendSoftLight

description.en: Blends the input value Blend onto input Base using the SoftLight blend mode.
description.zh: 使用 [柔光模式] 混合两个输入的图层。

main: vec4 main(vec4 Base, vec4 Blend, float Opacity) {
vec4 result1 = 2.0 * Base * Blend + Base * Base * (1.0 - 2.0 * Blend);
vec4 result2 = sqrt(Base) * (2.0 * Blend - 1.0) + 2.0 * Base * (1.0 - Blend);
return mix(Base, result2 * zeroOrOne + (1.0 - zeroOrOne) * result1, Opacity);
